items.title: Performance Brake Pads Set
items.description: High-performance ceramic brake pads designed for superior stopping power and reduced brake dust. Compatible with most modern vehicles. Includes hardware and anti-squeal shims.

items.title: LED Headlight Conversion Kit
items.description: Ultra-bright 6000K LED headlight bulbs with plug-and-play installation. 50,000 hour lifespan. Provides 300% more brightness than standard halogen bulbs.

items.title: Engine Air Filter
items.description: High-flow reusable air filter improves engine performance and fuel efficiency. Washable and reusable for up to 50,000 miles. Fits most 4-cylinder engines.

items.title: Racing Spark Plugs Set
items.description: Iridium racing spark plugs for maximum ignition power. Set of 4. Designed for high-performance engines. Improves throttle response and fuel efficiency.

items.title: Alloy Wheel 18 inch
items.description: Lightweight forged aluminum alloy wheel. 18x8 inch with 5x114.3 bolt pattern. Gunmetal finish. Perfect for sport sedans and coupes.

items.title: Performance Exhaust System
items.description: Cat-back stainless steel exhaust system. Deep aggressive tone. Increases horsepower by 15-20HP. Includes all hardware and installation instructions.

items.title: Heavy Duty Battery
items.description: AGM deep-cycle battery with 800 cold cranking amps. Maintenance-free design. 3-year warranty. Perfect for vehicles with high electrical demands.

items.title: Oil Filter Premium
items.description: High-efficiency oil filter with synthetic media. Captures 99% of contaminants. Extended service interval up to 10,000 miles. Universal fit for most engines.

items.title: Disc Brake Rotor Pair
items.description: Slotted and vented brake rotors for improved cooling and performance. Set of 2 front rotors. Reduces brake fade and improves wet-weather braking.

items.title: LED Tail Light Assembly
items.description: Complete LED tail light assembly with sequential turn signals. Smoked lens design. Direct OEM replacement with enhanced visibility and modern styling.

items.title: Fuel Injector Set
items.description: High-flow fuel injectors, set of 4. Precision-matched for optimal fuel delivery. Improves power and throttle response. Includes O-rings and clips.

items.title: Performance Coil Springs
items.description: Lowering coil springs that reduce ride height by 1.5 inches. Progressive spring rate for improved handling. Maintains comfortable ride quality.

items.title: Carbon Fiber Hood
items.description: Lightweight carbon fiber hood reduces front-end weight by 50%. OEM fitment with UV-protected clear coat. Includes all mounting hardware.

items.title: Turbocharger Kit
items.description: Complete bolt-on turbo kit with all necessary components. Capable of 300+ HP gains. Includes turbo, manifold, intercooler, piping, and tune.

items.title: Racing Seat Pair
items.description: Fixed-back racing seats with FIA certification. Deep bolsters for maximum support. Black with red stitching. Includes side mount brackets.

items.title: Test Brake Caliper
items.description: High-performance brake caliper for testing purposes. This description is longer than 10 characters.

items.title: Updated Test Item
items.description: Updated description for testing purposes. This is definitely longer than 10 characters.
